FuncDef: The display multicast-nat instance command displays information about a specified multicast NAT instance or all multicast NAT instances.
CLIs: display multicast-nat instance [ id <instance-id> [ name <instance-name> ] ] [ slot <slot-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about the multicast NAT instance with a specified ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 16000.

Displays information about the multicast NAT instance with a specified name.
The value is a string of 1 to 127 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Displays translation information on the outbound interface to which a multicast NAT instance is bound in a specified slot.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After configuring multicast NAT, run the display multicast-nat instance command to check information about multicast NAT instances.
Precautions
This command is supported only in the admin VS.
